title: SPORT A MAFIA IN THE HANDS OF DRUG DEALERS, CASINO OPERATORS, SAYS ARJUNA
content: Sport is a mafia in the hands of drug dealers and casino operators, says parliamentarian Arjuna Ranatunga. Addressing a function at Kalutara yesterday, the parliamentarian of the Democratic National Alliance (DNA) said that said that except for cricket, there has been a downfall in all other sports in the island….
